title: Teachers workshop on Building Connection with Children conducted under CFC programme
description:
Teachers workshop on, “Building Connection with Children” was held in the auditorium of Vikram Higher secondary School, BHEL Campus, Piplani, Bhopal on 18th June, 2019. Participants included the teachers of schools of BHEL Education Society, i.e. Vikram Higher Secondary School, two branches of Jawahar Higher Secondary School. 200 teachers participated in the workshop.

The workshop was inaugurated by Mrs Neelam Bhogal-President-BHEL Education Society, by lighting the traditional lamp and Saraswati Poojan. Introductory remarks of Child for Child programme was presented along with the purpose, vision, mission and belief of Smile Foundation and CFC was presented and also the objective of the said workshop, narrating how the older teaching learning methodology has become obsolete in today’s modern education system.

Mrs Neelam Bhogal, in her inaugural speech, also pressed upon the need of modern and novel techniques of teaching and learning processes and the need for such workshops. She urged the teachers to take it forward for the holistic development of the students and the institution.

The workshop was intense and was made interesting and interactive by Ms Deepti. It was a real treat to watch her delivering the subject and handling the huge number of participants and ensuring each one pays apt attention and gets involved in the discussions. She took all the participants to think about their childhood and then one by one she covered all the nuances of building connection with the newer age students. The workshop was appreciated by one and all.
